categories.name: Communication
categories.description: Skills related to verbal and written communication

categories.name: Cognitive
categories.description: Skills related to thinking and problem solving

categories.name: Leadership
categories.description: Skills related to managing people and projects

categories.name: Project Management
categories.description: Skills related to project planning and execution

skills.name: Speaking
skills.description: Ability to verbally communicate information clearly
skills.statement: I can tell something in a way that people understand me.

skills.name: Persuasive Speaking
skills.description: Ability to influence or inform an audience
skills.statement: I can speak persuasively to influence or inform an audience.

skills.name: Voice Modulation
skills.description: Ability to adapt voice and intonation to convey emotions
skills.statement: I can adapt my voice and intonation to effectively convey emotions and intentions.

skills.name: Information Documentation
skills.description: Ability to write information so others can understand it
skills.statement: I can document data so that other people understand it.

skills.name: Active Listening
skills.description: Ability to listen and summarize what was said
skills.statement: I can listen to a conversation and ask targeted questions to gain more information.

skills.name: Numeracy
skills.description: Ability to work with numbers and solve numerical problems
skills.statement: I can calculate and solve problems with numbers.

skills.name: Rule Application
skills.description: Ability to apply learned rules to solve problems
skills.statement: I can use rules I've learned to solve problems.

skills.name: Scientific Method
skills.description: Ability to design and conduct experiments
skills.statement: I can design and conduct experiments to investigate questions.

skills.name: Data Validation
skills.description: Ability to assess data reliability
skills.statement: I can evaluate the reliability of data before using it in my analysis.

skills.name: Reading Comprehension
skills.description: Ability to read and understand written text
skills.statement: I can read and understand written text.

skills.name: Python Programming
skills.description: Ability to develop applications using Python
skills.statement: I can develop applications in Python.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.description: Ability to analyze datasets and extract insights
skills.statement: I can analyze large datasets and extract meaningful insights.

skills.name: Cloud Infrastructure
skills.description: Ability to deploy and manage cloud resources
skills.statement: I can deploy and manage infrastructure in cloud environments.

skills.name: SQL
skills.description: Ability to query and manipulate databases using SQL
skills.statement: I can write SQL queries to retrieve and manipulate data.

skills.name: Team Leadership
skills.description: Ability to lead and motivate a team
skills.statement: I can lead and motivate a team to achieve objectives.

skills.name: Strategic Thinking
skills.description: Ability to develop and implement strategies
skills.statement: I can develop and implement strategic plans.

skills.name: Conflict Resolution
skills.description: Ability to resolve conflicts between team members
skills.statement: I can help resolve conflicts between team members.

skills.name: Task Planning
skills.description: Ability to break down projects into tasks
skills.statement: I can break down projects into manageable tasks.

skills.name: Resource Allocation
skills.description: Ability to allocate resources effectively
skills.statement: I can allocate resources effectively to maximize productivity.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.description: Ability to identify and mitigate project risks
skills.statement: I can identify and mitigate risks in projects.
